sqlMap.select: select p_id, p_name, p_price, p_img, p_detail, p_date, m_id, ct_id, p_status from( select p_id, p_name, p_price, p_img, p_detail, p_date, m_id, ct_id, p_status, ROWNUM RS from product where p_status = 'n' order by p_date desc ) where rs between #startPage# AND #endPage#

select * from ( select p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_img, p.p_detail, p.p_date, p.m_id, p.ct_id, p.p_status, ROWNUM RS from ( select * from category where ct_small = #category# or ct_large = #category# ) ct join product p on p.ct_id = ct.ct_id ) where RS BETWEEN #startPage# AND #endPage#
select * from category where ct_large = #category# or ct_small = #category#
